description: This file is a server-side entry point for a Remix.js application, handling server requests, rendering components, and managing streaming responses for server-side rendering.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main entry function handling incoming HTTP requests, differentiating bot and browser requests and setting appropriate response headers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering and response streaming when a bot user-agent is detected, using React server components.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering and response streaming for browser clients, supporting server-side rendering with React.
